cast.overview: Purehearted teen Lazzaro is content living as a sharecropper in rural Italy, but an unlikely friendship with the marquise’s son will change his world.
cast.title: Happy as Lazzaro

details.biography: Adriano Tardiolo was attending the high school when he was discovered by talent scouts for Alice Rohrwacher's film 'Happy as Lazzaro' (2018). Although he had no acting experience, he won the title role against more than a thousand competitors of the same age.  Tardiolo went on to study economics at Università degli Studi della Tuscia in Viterbo.
details.name: Adriano Tardiolo
